price: ហើយត្រែត្រូវបានគេផ្លុំ។ នោះហើយគឺជាថ្ងៃនៃការសន្យា ធ្វើទារុណកម្ម(ចំពោះពួកប្រឆាំង)។
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
